name: Pictured Crossword
description:
A crossword puzzle where many of the hints are pictures!

The hints are also embedded inside the grid.

I recommend printing the "Pictured Crossword.png"-file and solving with a pen. The solution is also available as a PNG.

You can also solve the digital version if you wish, using either keyboard, mouse, or both.

I can't test Mac and Linux versions, but they should work.
